questions.question: You ONLY want to manage Applications and Data. Which type of Cloud Computing model should you use?
What is the pricing model of Cloud Computing?
Which Global Infrastructure identity is composed of one or more discrete data centers with redundant power, networking, and connectivity, and are used to deploy infrastructure?
Which of the following is NOT one of the Five Characteristics of Cloud Computing?

answers.text: Dedicated Support Agent to help you deploy applications

questions.question: Which are the 3 pricing fundamentals of the AWS Cloud?

answers.text: Compute, Storage, and Data transfer in the AWS Cloud
Compute, Networking, and Data transfer out of the AWS Cloud
Compute, Storage, and Data transfer out of the AWS Cloud
Storage, Functions, and Data transfer in the AWS Cloud

questions.question: Which of the following options is NOT a point of consideration when choosing an AWS Region?
Which of the following is NOT an advantage of Cloud Computing?

answers.text: Trade capital expense (CAPEX) for operational expense (OPEX)
Stop spending money running and maintaining data centers

questions.question: AWS Regions are composed of?

answers.text: One or more discrete data centers

questions.question: Which of the following services has a global scope?
Which of the following is the definition of Cloud Computing?

answers.text: Rapidly develop, test and launch software applications
Automatic and quick ability to acquire resources as you need them and release resources when you no longer need them
On-demand availability of computer system resources, especially data storage (cloud storage) and computing power, without direct active management by the user

questions.question: What defines the distribution of responsibilities for security in the AWS Cloud?
A company would like to benefit from the advantages of the Public Cloud but would like to keep sensitive assets in its own infrastructure. Which deployment model should the company use?
What is NOT authorized to do on AWS according to the AWS Acceptable Use Policy?
What is a proper definition of IAM Roles?

answers.text: An IAM entity that defines a set of permissions for making AWS service requests, that will be used by AWS services
Permissions assigned to Users to perform actions

questions.question: Which of the following is an IAM Security Tool?
Which answer is INCORRECT regarding IAM Users?

answers.text: IAM Users can belong to multiple groups
IAM Users don't have to belong to a group
IAM Users can have policies assigned to them
IAM Users access AWS with the root account credentials

questions.question: Which of the following is an IAM best practice?

answers.text: Don't use the root user account
Create several users for a physical person
Share credentials so a colleague can perform a task for you
Do not enable MFA for easier access

questions.question: What are IAM Policies?

answers.text: JSON documents to define Users, Groups or Roles' permissions
Rules to set up a password for IAM Users

questions.question: Under the shared responsibility model, what is the customer responsible for in IAM?
Which of the following statements is TRUE?

answers.text: The AWS CLI can interact with AWS using commands in your command-line shell, while the AWS SDK can interact with AWS programmatically.
The AWS SDK can interact with AWS using commands in your command-line shell, while the AWS CLI can interact with AWS programmatically.

questions.question: Which principle should you apply regarding IAM Permissions?

answers.text: Grant permissions if your employee asks you to

questions.question: What should you do to increase your root account security?

answers.text: Remove permissions from the root account
Use AWS only through the Command Line Interface (CLI)
